mapper.select: SELECT cm.user_code AS userCode, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.email as email FROM chat_member cm JOIN user_info ui ON cm.user_code = ui.user_code WHERE cm.chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId}
SELECT cr.chat_room_id AS chatRoomId FROM chat_room cr JOIN chat_member cm ON cr.chat_room_id = cm.chat_room_id WHERE cm.user_code = #{userCode}
